items.title: HyFun Foods plans IPO by 2028, aims Rs 1,500-crore revenue in FY26
items.description: Anticipating market growth, the company is focusing on expansion plans as it invests in large manufacturing facilities and expands product portfolio.

items.title: Warburg to infuse Rs 500 cr more in Truhome; CEO says biz scale in place for IPO
items.description: This will take the private equity major’s overall investment in the entity, which was formerly known as Shriram Housing Finance, to over Rs 2,000 crore.

items.title: DGCA keeps 'rigorous oversight' on festive airfares as IndiGo, Air India, and SpiceJet add over 1,700 flights
items.description: While airfares remain deregulated, the DGCA has the authority to monitor pricing trends and take corrective measures in case of excessive fare increases.

items.title: USFDA issues Form-483 with 4 observations to Lupin's Pithampur Unit-2 facility
